tool_description: Creates and manages hierarchical category structures for organizing rewards including parent-child relationships, category metadata, and display ordering for catalog organization.

category_description.description: Description of the category (up to 200 characters)

parent_category_id.description: ID of parent category for hierarchical organization

is_active.description: Whether category is active and visible

featured.description: Whether category should be featured prominently

error_messages: Invalid category_name: Name must be between 2-50 characters and contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, and hyphens.
Invalid category_description: Description cannot exceed 200 characters.
Invalid parent_category_id: Parent category must exist in the system.
Invalid display_order: Must be an integer between 1-1000.
Circular reference: Category cannot be its own parent or create circular hierarchy.
Duplicate category_name: A category with this name already exists at this hierarchy level.
Maximum depth exceeded: Category hierarchy cannot exceed 5 levels deep.
usage: Provide category_name as required parameter. Create top-level categories by omitting parent_category_id, or create subcategories by providing a valid parent_category_id. Use display_order to control the sequence of categories, and set featured to true for prominent categories.

category_id.description: Unique identifier for the created category

hierarchy_path.description: Full hierarchical path of the category (e.g., 'Electronics > Audio > Headphones')

category_level.description: Depth level in the hierarchy (1 for top-level categories)
